benchmark_details.name: Personalized Video Collection Benchmark (PVB)
benchmark_details.overview: We provide a new benchmark for personalized video dataset collection, where 10,000 Internet videos are annotated according to specific and distinct requirements.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a framework for efficient and automated customized video dataset construction.

data.source: Collected from public video platforms using automated filtering policies.
data.annotation: Manually reviewed and annotated according to specific requirements.

methodology.calculation: IoU calculated as TP / (TP + FP + FN) to measure the similarity between retrieved videos and ground truth.
methodology.interpretation: Higher IoU scores indicate better alignment with user requirements.
methodology.validation: User studies with iterative feedback and manual annotations.
